snippet: SPIESS--Bernard, beloved husband, brother, father, grandfather, mensch and friend, died Sunday, February 14, in Boynton Beach, FL. Bernie was born June 19, 1935 in Manhattan to Gussie and Irving Spiess. He graduated from Brooklyn Technical High School and City College of New York. He loved golf, jazz, politics, and spending time with his family. He is survived by Joyce, his beloved wife of 57 years; sister Lorraine Goldberg; devoted children Steven (Liora), Philip (Marcia), and Jennifer Parks (Dennis); adoring grandsons Alexander, Robert, Noah, Ryan, Joshua, and Isaac, and countless other friends and family. Bernie touched the lives of all who met him with his trademark generosity and loyalty. Funeral services will be held at 10:15am, Wednesday, February 17 at Beth Israel Memorial Chapel, 11115 Jog Road, Boynton Beach, FL. 1/3
